statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = '123 Main St'
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_details
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM transaction_details
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM transaction_details
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_sent_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = '456 Elm St'
SELECT receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_received_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address = '789 Oak St'
SELECT...
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address LIKE '%Bitcoin%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND amount >= 500
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'Bob' AND receiver_address = 'Alice'
SELECT sender_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address
SELECT DISTINCT receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-02-01'
SELECT transaction_id, blockchain_hash FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'Charlie' OR receiver_address = 'David'
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE timestampdiff(hour, transaction_date, NOW()) < 24
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount IN (100, 250, 500)
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = 'Eve'
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address != receiver_address
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address <> sender_address
SELECT sender_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2023-01-01' GROUP BY sender_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_details)
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, blockchain_hash FROM transaction_details WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL
SELECT receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE LENGTH(sender_address) > 15
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount >= 1000 AND sender_address IN ('Mike', 'Nancy', 'Oliver')
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'abc123';
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount = (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions);
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks;
SELECT block_id, previous_block_hash FROM blocks WHERE block_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(timestamp, previous_block_hash)) AS average_time_between_blocks FROM blocks;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_hash = 'xyz456';
SELECT SUM(block_id) AS total_blocks FROM blocks;
SELECT SUM(block_id) AS total_blocks, MAX(block_id) AS max_block_id FROM blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT receiver_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY receiver_address;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01' AND TIMESTAMP < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '1234567890' AND receiver_address = '0987654321';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_sent FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT receiver_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY receiver_address;
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) AS total_blocks FROM blocks GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM transactions INNER JOIN blocks ON transactions.timestamp = blocks.timestamp;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, blocks.block_id, transactions.amount FROM transactions LEFT JOIN blocks ON transactions.transaction_id = blocks.block_id;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, sender_address FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address HAVING AVG(amount) > 500;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT sender_address, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT receiver_address, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY receiver_address HAVING AVG(amount) < 500;
SELECT block_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, asset_type, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE num_transactions > 10;

SELECT b.block_id, b.block_hash, b.block_timestamp, bt.transaction_id, t.sender_address FROM blockchain_blocks b JOIN block_transactions bt ON b.block_id = bt.block_id JOIN transaction_details t ON bt.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT b.block_id, b.block_timestamp, COUNT(bt.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks b LEFT JOIN block_transactions bt ON b.block_id = bt.block_id GROUP BY b.block_id;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT bt.block_id, t.sender_address, t.receiver_address FROM block_transactions bt JOIN transaction_details t ON bt.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.asset_type = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_details WHERE asset_type = 'Ethereum';
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM transaction_details;
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT sender_address, SUM(amount) AS total_sent_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_received_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY receiver_address HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT AVG(num_transactions) AS avg_num_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp, num_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-06-30';

SELECT b.block_id, COUNT(bt.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks b LEFT JOIN block_transactions bt ON b.block_id = bt.block_id GROUP BY b.block_id HAVING COUNT(bt.transaction_id) < 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE num_transactions < 10;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM block_timestamp) = 8;
SELECT td.transaction_id, td.sender_address, td.receiver_address, bt.block_id FROM transaction_details td INNER JOIN block_transactions bt ON td.transaction_id = bt.transaction_id;
SELECT bt.block_id, COUNT(bt.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM block_transactions bt GROUP BY bt.block_id HAVING COUNT(bt.transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address IN (SELECT sender_address FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address HAVING COUNT(sender_address) > 1);
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM transaction_details WHERE amount >= 500 AND amount <= 1000;
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id ORDER BY COUNT(transaction_id) DESC;
SELECT bt.block_id, SUM(td.amount) AS total_amount FROM block_transactions bt INNER JOIN transaction_details td ON bt.transaction_id = td.transaction_id GROUP BY bt.block_id;
SELECT td.asset_type, AVG(td.amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_details td GROUP BY td.asset_type ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details td1 JOIN transaction_details td2 ON td1.sender_address = td2.sender_address AND td1.timestamp < td2.timestamp;
SELECT sender_address, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT sender_address, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT block_timestamp, COUNT(block_id) AS num_blocks, SUM(num_transactions) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks GROUP BY block_timestamp;
SELECT block_id, AVG(num_transactions) AS avg_transactions FROM blockchain_blocks GROUP BY block_id;
SELECT * FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = (SELECT MAX(block_id) FROM blockchain_blocks);
SELECT block_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) AS unique_transactions FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_details GROUP BY asset_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT block_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM block_transactions bt INNER JOIN transaction_details td ON bt.transaction_id = td.transaction_id GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT td.asset_type) > 1;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM block_details;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_id, transaction_count, timestamp FROM block_details WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM asset_details;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, total_supply, owner_address, created_at FROM asset_details WHERE total_supply >= 1000000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network;
SELECT network_id, network_name, node_count, consensus_algorithm, created_at FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_count > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE sender_address = '0x123456';
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM block_details WHERE previous_block_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM asset_details WHERE owner_address = '0xabcdef';
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM blockchain_network WHERE consensus_algorithm = 'PoW';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 500 AND receiver_address = '0x78910';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM block_details WHERE transaction_count < 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, total_supply FROM asset_details WHERE created_at > '2022-06-01';
SELECT network_id, network_name, created_at FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_count < 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM block_details WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, owner_address FROM asset_details WHERE total_supply BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT network_id, network_name, node_count FROM blockchain_network WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM block_details WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_details WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT network_name, node_count FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_count > 50;
SELECT asset_name, total_supply FROM asset_details WHERE total_supply < 100000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details INNER JOIN block_details ON transaction_details.transaction_id = block_details.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details LEFT JOIN block_details ON transaction_details.transaction_id = block_details.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details RIGHT JOIN block_details ON transaction_details.transaction_id = block_details.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details FULL JOIN block_details ON transaction_details.transaction_id = block_details.block_id;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transaction_details GROUP BY sender_address;
SELECT MAX(total_supply) FROM asset_details WHERE owner_address = 'Alice';
SELECT MIN(node_count) FROM blockchain_network WHERE consensus_algorithm = 'Proof of Stake';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_details WHERE receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT DISTINCT network_name FROM blockchain_network;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_details GROUP BY timestamp;
SELECT network_name, COUNT(*) AS node_count FROM blockchain_network GROUP BY network_name;
SELECT asset_name, SUM(total_supply) AS total_supply FROM asset_details GROUP BY asset_name;
SELECT * FROM asset_details WHERE created_at = (SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM asset_details);

SELECT asset_id, asset_name, total_supply FROM asset_details WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_details.amount > 1000 AND transaction_details.transaction_id = asset_details.asset_id);
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_height FROM blocks WHERE block_height < 1000;
SELECT * FROM addresses;
SELECT address_id, balance FROM addresses WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM holders;
SELECT holder_id, holder_name FROM holders WHERE holder_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'crypto';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '123abc';
SELECT block_id, timestamp, miner_address FROM blocks WHERE miner_address = '456def';
SELECT address_id, balance, transactions_count FROM addresses WHERE transactions_count > 1000;
SELECT holder_id, holder_name, address_id FROM holders WHERE holder_name = 'Alice';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, owner_id FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'token';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY block_height ASC;
SELECT * FROM addresses ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM holders ORDER BY holder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM addresses;
SELECT MIN(transactions_count) AS min_transactions_count FROM addresses;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x1234567890';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address = '0x9876543210';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x5555555555' AND amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_height > 100 AND miner_address = '0xabcdef123456';
SELECT block_id, timestamp, block_height FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_hash = '0xabcdef123456';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE balance < 1000;
SELECT address_id, address, transactions_count FROM addresses WHERE address LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT * FROM holders WHERE holder_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM holders WHERE holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'crypto' AND owner_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT holder_id FROM holders WHERE holder_name = 'Bob');
SELECT * FROM holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id WHERE a.balance > 10000;
SELECT h.holder_name, a.balance FROM holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id WHERE h.holder_name = 'Charlie';
SELECT h.holder_name, a.balance FROM holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id WHERE h.holder_name = 'David' AND a.balance < 5000;
SELECT h.holder_name, SUM(a.balance) AS total_balance FROM holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id GROUP BY h.holder_name;
SELECT holder_name, COUNT(asset_id) AS num_assets FROM holders h INNER JOIN assets a ON h.holder_id = a.owner_id GROUP BY holder_name;
SELECT holder_name, AVG(a.balance) AS avg_balance FROM holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id GROUP BY holder_name;
